response.overview: This music documentary, which has already received a platinum award, reports on the first 10 years of Frei.Wild in an exciting and relentlessly honest way. Philipp, Zegga, FÃ¶hre and Jonas; In 2001 the South Tyroleans founded a band with this line-up, which has remained unchanged to this day, and which to this day can be regarded as the most controversial band in the German music scene. Idolically loved on the one hand, almost devilishly hated on the other. With this work, the film producers open up some never-before-seen archives of a band that shows everything in these 1.5 hours, from the first steps to sold-out arenas. Anyone who thinks they know the bitterly competitive German-speaking rock 'n' roll business will be taught otherwise...
response.title: 10 Years of Antidote- The Documentation
